title: MythicMobs的一点小报错
txt_content:
每次开服务器都会出现这一句报错，不知道是否影响使用
请问这是什么。。。怎么解决？

11:46 上午 [SEVERE] [MythicMobs] The updater could not contact dev.bukkit.org for updating. 
11:46 上午 [SEVERE] [MythicMobs] If you have not recently modified your configuration and this is the first time you are seeing this message, the site may be experiencing temporary downtime. 
11:46 上午 [SEVERE] [MythicMobs] null 
java.net.UnknownHostException: api.curseforge.com
        at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source)
        at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.New(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.https.AbstractDeleg ... on.getNewHttpClient(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.https.AbstractDelegateHttpsURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsURLConnectionImpl.getInputStream(Unknown Source)
        at net.gravitydevelopment.updater.Updater.read(Updater.java:546)
        at net.gravitydevelopment.updater.Updater.access$200(Updater.java:41)
        at net.gravitydevelopment.updater.Updater$UpdateRunnable.run(Updater.java:584)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

replies.author: 极光酋长
replies.txt_content:
MM的检查更新器无法及时连接bukkit.org，面板服常见吧（如果是）...
如果不想见到它们，配置文件内：
CheckForUpdates: true
 #改为false即可
